1380: Margareta was born in Walker straet in 1380.
1385: Lost father at the age of 5.
1393: Got married to Goeskin at age 14 in 1393.
Margareta moved to Walker straet.B.1 after marriage.
Became caretaker of Godeweris, Syuardus, Hubrecht at age 14.
Moved in with husband Goeskin after marriage.
1395: Gave birth to Herman in 1395 at age 15.
Lost mother at the age of 15.
1396: Gave birth to Suam in 1396 at age 16.
1397: Gave birth to Berta in 1397 at age 17.
1398: Lost son Suam when Suam was 3 years old.
1399: Gave birth to Tiedeman in 1399 at age 19.
